title: ICE / ACELE
description: Lead-in to the speedfreaks, out on the ice

dialogueTree.title: Acele: ""Hard-cop." She nods to you with re..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hard-cop." She nods to you with respect and turns off her recording device.

links.title: You: ""I got shot in the leg." (Point at..."
links.text: "I got shot in the leg." (Point at your limb.)

links.title: Acele: ""Ouch." She looks at your leg. "I d..."
links.text: "Ouch." She looks at your leg. "I did notice you limping, but I thought maybe it was your 'thing' or something..."

links.title: Acele: ""When I was sixteen I used to date..."
links.text: "When I was sixteen I used to date this guy who had a limp. But it only showed when he was sober, so I guess it wasn't real or something. I don't know." She shrugs, eyes glazed over...

links.title: Acele: ""Anyway…" She turns back to you. "S..."
links.text: "Anyway…" She turns back to you. "Shot in the leg... I'm sorry, man, that must suck."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, can we talk for a minute?""
links.text: "Yeah, can we talk for a minute?"

links.title: Acele: ""I was wondering when you would com..."
links.text: "I was wondering when you would come around. What's up?"

links.title: You: ""I guess... there is something... t..."
links.text: "I guess... there is something... that's been making my life hell."

links.title: Acele: ""What is it?" She listens intently."
links.text: "What is it?" She listens intently.

links.title: You: ""I think it's the plight of the wor..."
links.text: "I think it's the plight of the working class."

links.title: Acele: ""Oh, really?""
links.text: "Oh, really?"

links.title: You: ""The golem of capital runs rampant,..."
links.text: "The golem of capital runs rampant, smashing creator and slave alike. I fear the process is irreversible."

links.title: Acele: ""Wow. Social justice really matters..."
links.text: "Wow. Social justice really matters that much to you? That's commendable. It really had you shaken up there... are you *sure* that's it, though?"

links.title: You: ""I haven't seen much of this world,..."
links.text: "I haven't seen much of this world, but from what I've seen *social justice* is an adolescent term. Sounds almost liberal... what's got me shaken up is the *people's struggle* and it's got me shaken up *bad*."

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah, man, they're pretty bad," sh..."
links.text: "Yeah, man, they're pretty bad," she says, without much conviction.

links.title: You: ""It makes me sick, thinking about t..."
links.text: "It makes me sick, thinking about the thousands... millions... billions? How many people are there, actually?"

links.title: Acele: ""Um...""
You: ""How many people are there in the w..."
links.text: "How many people are there in the world?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Three-point-six billion, not count..."
links.text: "Three-point-six billion, not counting those on Seol."

links.title: You: ""Really? That many?! Reduces me to..."
links.text: "Really? That many?! Reduces me to tears thinking of the 3.6 billion and god knows how many more in that Seol place, crushed under the tyranny of the market."

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah, that's pretty bad," she nods..."
links.text: "Yeah, that's pretty bad," she nods. "Are you sure you're not just hung up on some chick though?"

links.title: Acele: ""A city has millions in it, so the..."
links.text: "A city has millions in it, so the world would have a lot more. I think I knew the number once..."

links.title: You: ""Too many millions to even know, al..."
links.text: "Too many millions to even know, all squashed under the tyranny of the market. It's terrible!"

links.title: You: ""I think it's... all these *foreign..."
links.text: "I think it's... all these *foreign people* taking our jobs."

links.title: Acele: ""Oh, really?""
links.text: "Oh, really?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I can tell this was once a p..."
links.text: "Yeah, I can tell this was once a proud nation. Now all this internationalist bullshit has brought Revachol to its knees."

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah, man," she nods. "That's why..."
links.text: "Yeah, man," she nods. "That's why you were crying over a hat, yelling about regaining your authority. National pride."

links.title: You: ""That's those foreign ideas messing..."
links.text: "That's those foreign ideas messing with your head. You don't even realize you're *literally* on your knees right now! Our women -- literally on their knees!"

links.title: Acele: ""Man, that's because my equipment's..."
links.text: "Man, that's because my equipment's on the ground."

links.title: You: ""People just keep putting their sel..."
links.text: "People just keep putting their selfish interests ahead of the greater good."

links.title: Acele: ""Oh, really?""
links.text: "Oh, really?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah. No one understands that some..."
links.text: "Yeah. No one understands that sometimes you've got to make sacrifices for the sake of progress. It's all very distressing."

links.title: Acele: ""So, the thing that's been eating y..."
links.text: "So, the thing that's been eating you... is the slow pace of social progress?"

links.title: You: ""Don't get me wrong, I'm all for sl..."
links.text: "Don't get me wrong, I'm all for slow and steady progress. I just wish people would be a little more *reasonable*, is all."

links.title: Acele: ""Okay, so you're not *that* upset,..."
links.text: "Okay, so you're not *that* upset, it sounds like."

links.title: You: ""I told you, I'm *highly* distresse..."
links.text: "I told you, I'm *highly* distressed by this state of affairs."

links.title: Acele: ""Uh huh, and you're sure it's socia..."
links.text: "Uh huh, and you're sure it's social progress you're distressed about and not, I don't know, some chick?"

links.title: You: ""You said eating me? There's nothin..."
links.text: "You said eating me? There's nothing eating me."

links.title: Acele: ""C'mon, I can tell." She shakes her..."
links.text: "C'mon, I can tell." She shakes her head slowly. "But, okay, be a boiadeiro about it if you want to."

links.title: You: ""Exactly. I don't wanna talk about..."
links.text: "Exactly. I don't wanna talk about it."

links.title: Acele: ""You sure?""
links.text: "You sure?"

links.title: You: ""Actually....""
links.text: "Actually...."

links.title: Acele: ""Go ahead...""
links.text: "Go ahead..."

links.title: You: ""Yes, I'm sure. Now, I had some que..."
links.text: "Yes, I'm sure. Now, I had some questions for you."

links.title: Acele: ""Sure.""
links.text: "Sure."

links.title: You: ""Your associates tried to use me to..."
links.text: "Your associates tried to use me to set up a drug lab. I'm guessing you knew of this plan."

links.title: You: ""The others told me you went inside..."
links.text: "The others told me you went inside the church. What did you see in there?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Diamorphine*, girl. Quit clownin'..."
links.text: "*Diamorphine*, girl. Quit clownin'. We need a hook-up for that D..." He breathes in through his teeth.

links.title: Acele: ""Diamorphine? But that hasn't been..."
links.text: "Diamorphine? But that hasn't been around for years -- five or more, like, seven years maybe? Everybody just does *hunch* now."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Interesting."
links.text: Interesting.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Really? What's that?""
links.text: "Really? What's that?"

links.title: Acele: ""Hunch is like ten times stronger t..."
links.text: "Hunch is like ten times stronger than diamorphine and *waaay* more lethal. I think the name is... B-hydroxy-something."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "B-hydroxy-phenothiazine. Somewhere..."
links.text: B-hydroxy-phenothiazine. Somewhere in the soggy remains of your factual memory, you know the name. From the streets.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "It's the dark lord himself, put int..."
links.text: It's the dark lord himself, put into chemical form. Even I don't suggest it.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay." The lieutenant stops hoppin..."
links.text: "Okay." The lieutenant stops hopping. "That's... that's real bad. Someone should definitely look into that..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He rolls his collar down to normal..."
links.text: He rolls his collar down to normal human level and pulls out his familiar notebook. "We're from the police, by the way."

links.title: Acele: ""Oh, of course." She doesn't look s..."
links.text: "Oh, of course." She doesn't look surprised.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "C'mon. She must have known it the m..."
links.text: C'mon. She must have known it the moment you walked up to her.

links.title: You: ""Yes, and we have some questions fo..."
links.text: "Yes, and we have some questions for you."

links.title: Acele: ""Right.""
links.text: "Right."

links.title: You: ""Uh... we'll be back later." [Leave..."
links.text: "Uh... we'll be back later." [Leave.]

links.title: Authority: "Something about the way she says it..."
links.text: Something about the way she says it makes you think she's not bothered by any of the cop-show questioning.

links.title: You: ""I'd like to know more about your a..."
links.text: "I'd like to know more about your associates..."

links.title: Acele: ""What do you mean?""
links.text: "What do you mean?"

links.title: You: ""The silver bird.""
links.text: "The silver bird."

links.title: Acele: ""All right," she concedes. "My fath..."
links.text: "All right," she concedes. "My father was a Zemylaki. He died years ago. He was a bad man. Not a lot of good things to say about him and what he did."

links.title: Acele: ""He bought the family a huge house,..."
links.text: "He bought the family a huge house, so we got to live... at least temporarily... in a giant *castle* in Jamrock. And then he died."

links.title: You: ""What happened next?""
links.text: "What happened next?"

links.title: Acele: ""What do you think? The competition..."
links.text: "What do you think? The competition came and took everything away. It was like in a war zone..." She's gritting her teeth.

links.title: Acele: ""So after his death we had nothing..."
links.text: "So after his death we had nothing left. And we were in danger. My mother had to change her name, mine too. We left it all behind."

links.title: You: ""Are you sure about that? What abou..."
links.text: "Are you sure about that? What about this drug lab plan?"

links.title: Acele: ""It was a stupid idea and I'm still..."
links.text: "It was a stupid idea and I'm still disappointed *I* came up with it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Aren't there any local authorities..."
links.text: "Aren't there any local authorities who might look down on such activities?"

links.title: Acele: ""I took that into account, of cours..."
links.text: "I took that into account, of course. Coordinated the operation with the Débardeurs, else they might get... unhappy."

links.title: You: ""So, what you're saying is... Evrar..."
links.text: "So, what you're saying is... Evrart authorized this?"

links.title: Acele: ""Not in person, but I let them know..."
links.text: "Not in person, but I let them know. You can't do anything without the fat ones getting wind. It wasn't too difficult to convince them, really..."

links.title: Logic: "Remember those bold, new exotic rev..."
links.text: Remember those bold, new exotic revenue streams Evrart said he was going to fund his harbour with? You should go back and ask him about that.

links.title: Acele: ""I was kinda hoping you'd end this..."
links.text: "I was kinda hoping you'd end this mess, though. It feels like I've been turning dad-wise, into a corrupt business-person. I don't like it."

links.title: Authority: "Hear that? Set justice on its feet...."
links.text: Hear that? Set justice on its feet. CONFRONT EVRART.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "C'mon. This is all fine, but you do..."
links.text: C'mon. This is all fine, but you don't have anything on Evrart now. That's not how these things work.

links.title: You: ""I should confront Evrart about thi..."
links.text: "I should confront Evrart about this! Maybe I can manipulate him using the information." (Add it to the list.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, I don't think it would lead an..."
links.text: "No, I don't think it would lead anywhere with Evrart. He's just going to deny it."

links.title: Acele: ""Yeaaahhhh..." She really draws out..."
links.text: "Yeaaahhhh..." She really draws out the word. "Have you seen Evrart?"

links.title: Acele: ""That's not going to lead anywhere..."
links.text: "That's not going to lead anywhere with Evrart. He'll just deny everything. I mean, have you seen the guy?"

links.title: You: ""This is all good to know... but le..."
links.text: "This is all good to know... but let's leave it at that." (Leave it off the list.)

links.title: Acele: ""Do. It's for the best.""
links.text: "Do. It's for the best."

links.title: Acele: ""It's a good thing you ended that m..."
links.text: "It's a good thing you ended that mess, though. I felt I was turning dad-wise, into a corrupt business-person. Unpleasant."

links.title: Acele: ""I'm kinda hoping you'll end this m..."
links.text: "I'm kinda hoping you'll end this mess before we get going... I feel as if I'm slowly turning dad-wise, into a corrupt business-person. I don't like it."

links.title: You: ""So you're the main drive behind ev..."
links.text: "So you're the main drive behind everything?"

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah, kinda. I'm the head of the o..."
links.text: "Yeah, kinda. I'm the head of the operation. Coordinated it with the Débardeurs, else they might get... unhappy."

links.title: You: ""You don't call a sudden drug lab i..."
links.text: "You don't call a sudden drug lab inside this church organized crime?"

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah... I was kinda hoping you'd e..."
links.text: "Yeah... I was kinda hoping you'd end that mess before we got going. It feels like I've been slowly turning dad-wise, into a corrupt business-person.

links.title: Drama: "She's honest."
links.text: She's honest.

links.title: Acele: ""A shame you didn't...""
links.text: "A shame you didn't..."

links.title: You: ""That's nice to hear. You kids are..."
links.text: "That's nice to hear. You kids are good these days."

links.title: Acele: ""Gee, thanks. Now, was there anythi..."
links.text: "Gee, thanks. Now, was there anything else on your mind?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""'Left it all behind.' Are you sure..."
links.text: "'Left it all behind.' Are you sure you did?" The lieutenant narrows his eyes at the girl. "Who can tell with all the delinquent behaviour?"

links.title: Acele: "Acele stares at him blankly. Two un..."
links.text: Acele stares at him blankly. Two unflinching stares in collision course.

links.title: You: ""That's nice to hear. You kids are..."
links.text: "That's nice to hear. You kids are good these days."

links.title: Acele: ""Gee, thanks. Now, was there anythi..."
links.text: "Gee, thanks. Now, was there anything else on your mind?"

links.title: You: ""Turned you into a new generation d..."
links.text: "Turned you into a new generation drug user, though?"

links.title: Acele: ""Anything to get through." She shru..."
links.text: "Anything to get through." She shrugs. "That's how it is after the fall."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, no, don't worry, I was just..."
links.text: "Yeah, no, don't worry, I was just saying... I don't mind drugs, I'm all into drugs myself, yeah, drugs."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Who doesn't just *love* drugs? All..."
links.text: "Who doesn't just *love* drugs? All the drugs." The lieutenant's voice is flat, although with a seeming undertone of sarcasm.

links.title: Acele: ""Good for you. Now, was there anyth..."
links.text: "Good for you. Now, was there anything else on your mind?"

links.title: You: ""I'm not going to take you in for s..."
links.text: "I'm not going to take you in for such a tiny infraction, but I better not find anything else suspicious going on."

links.title: Acele: ""A life full of suspicion. Perhaps..."
links.text: "A life full of suspicion. Perhaps you should talk to Noid, you'd get along nicely... Now, was there something else on your mind?"

links.title: You: ""I doubt that. You're probably up t..."
links.text: "I doubt that. You're probably up to no good."

links.title: Acele: ""Who isn't? It's all *no good* in M..."
links.text: "Who isn't? It's all *no good* in Martinaise. Now, was there anything else on your mind?"

links.title: You: ""Oh, hmm, I can imagine what follow..."
links.text: "Oh, hmm, I can imagine what followed after."

links.title: Acele: ""You and I both, although... I don'..."
links.text: "You and I both, although... I don't have to *imagine*. The competition came and took everything away. It was like in a war zone..." She's gritting her teeth.

links.title: You: ""Never mind, I don't really want to..."
links.text: "Never mind, I don't really want to hear any of this."

links.title: Acele: ""Yes, better that way...""
links.text: "Yes, better that way..."

links.title: You: ""That's why you've handled my quest..."
links.text: "That's why you've handled my questioning so calmly."

links.title: You: ""I'd like to know more about your a..."
links.text: "I'd like to know more about your associates."

links.title: Acele: ""My 'associates'?" She blows on her..."
links.text: "My 'associates'?" She blows on her chilled fingers. "I haven't got much to say about them."

links.title: You: ""Just answer the question, please.""
links.text: "Just answer the question, please."

links.title: Acele: ""Sorry. I just don't tell people ab..."
links.text: "Sorry. I just don't tell people about my friends and who they are and so on. I don't provide information on them."

links.title: Rhetoric: "To the cops."
links.text: To the cops.

links.title: You: ""What about you? Tell me something..."
links.text: "What about you? Tell me something about yourself."

links.title: Acele: ""Me? I'm a silver bird.""
links.text: "Me? I'm a silver bird."

links.title: Shivers: "High above and to the east, the col..."
links.text: High above and to the east, the cold winds blow over the feathers of an early songbird. She lands on the stone ledge of a tall building. Her beak a silvery grey.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "A silver bird... feels strangely fa..."
links.text: A silver bird... feels strangely familiar. Was it an expression? And if yes, then for what? Then your mind slips and the thought is gone.

links.title: You: ""A-ha. Okay. Maybe I'll ask later a..."
links.text: "A-ha. Okay. Maybe I'll ask later about all this."

links.title: Acele: ""Don't know what makes you think it..."
links.text: "Don't know what makes you think it'll be any different later, but..."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Feels like you missed something her..."
links.text: Feels like you missed something here. What was that about a bird? Forget it. Maybe later.

links.title: You: ""What do you mean? You must know *s..."
links.text: "What do you mean? You must know *something* about them."

links.title: Acele: ""Of course I do. I just don't tell..."
links.text: "Of course I do. I just don't tell people about my friends and who they are and so on. I don't provide information on them."

links.title: You: ""Have you seen a suspicious woman a..."
links.text: "Have you seen a suspicious woman around here? A woman who looked like she might be on the run?"

links.title: Acele: ""No.""
links.text: "No."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Just no?""
links.text: "Just no?"

links.title: Acele: ""It's pretty desolate here, I only..."
links.text: "It's pretty desolate here, I only hear the dogs bark at night and see the shadows move down the coast."

links.title: Shivers: "Long shadows, short shadows. Quiet..."
links.text: Long shadows, short shadows. Quiet shadows of local children, loud shadows drunks and also a shadow made of sticks... you breathe on your hands for warmth.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Teenagers skulking around. Gang-mem..."
links.text: Teenagers skulking around. Gang-members looking for a hole in the Union's defences? Maybe Ruby too, but she wouldn't be able to tell from here.

links.title: You: ""That's good. No neighbours to comp..."
links.text: "That's good. No neighbours to complain about noise when you get the club going."

links.title: Acele: ""Exactly. It's our chance to turn t..."
links.text: "Exactly. It's our chance to turn the grim desolation into an overwhelmingly fun dance party!"

links.title: You: ""Considering what we're trying to d..."
links.text: "Considering what we're trying to do here this doesn't look like a good sign."

links.title: Acele: ""Superstition. We can turn the grim..."
links.text: "Superstition. We can turn the grim desolation into a fun dance club, and thus also help turn this hell-hole around."

links.title: You: ""What's your name?""
links.text: "What's your name?"

links.title: Reaction Speed: ""O pasăre de argint" -- it flutters..."
links.text: "O pasăre de argint" -- it flutters by your ear.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "It's what the "Zemlyaki" -- the Gra..."
links.text: It's what the "Zemlyaki" -- the Graadian community in Revachol -- call a person who never breaks under interrogation. It's an organized crime term.

links.title: You: ""O pasăre de argint.""
links.text: "O pasăre de argint."

links.title: Acele: ""Excuse me?" She casually brushes h..."
links.text: "Excuse me?" She casually brushes her hand through her hair.

links.title: Composure: "She's attempting to remain calm, bu..."
links.text: She's attempting to remain calm, but the phrase made her flinch.

links.title: You: ""I remember now... it's a Zemlyaki..."
links.text: "I remember now... it's a Zemlyaki term. For someone who won't break under questioning. An organized crime term."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "The silver bird has already flown a..."
links.text: The silver bird has already flown away... I will catch it later.

links.title: You: ""What's that device you have there?""
links.text: "What's that device you have there?"

links.title: Acele: ""Sure. Contact mic." She nods, star..."
links.text: "Sure. Contact mic." She nods, staring at the recording device in her hands.

links.title: You: ""I'm pretty sure I've got issues wi..."
links.text: "I'm pretty sure I've got issues with our young women kneeling in the snow with this *cosmopolitan* racket going on in the background." (Nod towards the tent.)

links.title: Acele: ""Or, or... I'm just gonna put this..."
links.text: "Or, or... I'm just gonna put this out there -- are you sure you're not having *chick* issues, with some chick?"

links.title: Volition: "Hmmm... *perhaps*?"
links.text: Hmmm... *perhaps*?

links.title: You: ""I'm positive. Now, I had some ques..."
links.text: "I'm positive. Now, I had some questions for you before all this started."

links.title: Acele: ""Go ahead.""
links.text: "Go ahead."

links.title: You: ""What are you doing out here in the..."
links.text: "What are you doing out here in the cold?"

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry you have to sit here on..."
links.text: "I'm sorry you have to sit here on this coast, feeling miserable. At your age -- or at any age -- in this place... waiting for it to get dark."

links.title: Acele: "She looks you in the eye, her pupil..."
links.text: She looks you in the eye, her pupils wide, surrounded by a ridiculous amount of make-up.

links.title: You: ""The people who built this world in..."
links.text: "The people who built this world intended it to be better for you, but they failed. It is easier to live in their failure with this by your side." (Tap on the tape recorder.)

links.title: Acele: "The wind howls. She remains silent."
links.text: The wind howls. She remains silent.

links.title: Empathy: "It's real. Tell her."
links.text: It's real. Tell her.

links.title: You: ""It is not a childish fantasy. It c..."
links.text: "It is not a childish fantasy. It can be a real weapon against what's coming for you now."

links.title: Acele: ""What is...?" Her shoulders shake a..."
links.text: "What is...?" Her shoulders shake a little.

links.title: You: ""The dark.""
links.text: "The dark."

links.title: Acele: ""I know." Her teeth rattle. She tak..."
links.text: "I know." Her teeth rattle. She takes the device from you and places it in her lap. "I'll stick to it."

links.title: Authority: "There is little you can do to help..."
links.text: There is little you can do to help her now, but given the chance you feel like you *should*. There is something about her. A weightiness.

links.title: Acele: "After a moment of silence she speak..."
links.text: After a moment of silence she speaks again: "So, thanks. I guess. For the psych session. I guess that means we're... even?" She smiles a little.

links.title: Suggestion: "She means your little talk before,..."
links.text: She means your little talk before, after your breakdown. It's all right, she means to say. You returned the favour.

links.title: Suggestion: "Something changes between you two...."
links.text: Something changes between you two. She looks at you differently now -- as an equal. A fellow human being.

links.title: Acele: "After a moment of silence she speak..."
links.text: After a moment of silence she speaks again: "So, thanks. I guess. For the psych session. Maybe I can return it -- what's been eating you, officer?"

links.title: You: ""Nothing, if you got this. Don't be..."
links.text: "Nothing, if you got this. Don't be scared."

links.title: Acele: ""Okay." Her teeth rattle. She takes..."
links.text: "Okay." Her teeth rattle. She takes the device from you and places it in her lap. "I'll stick to it."

links.title: You: ""I'm once again reminded of how Con..."
links.text: "I'm once again reminded of how Contact Mike rose from the slums of Saint-Batiste to the top of the boxing world, overcoming adversity and serious brain trauma. Nothing is coming -- nothing he wouldn't knock out in three rounds. The real fight is for the right attitude."

links.title: Acele: ""I can't believe this turned into a..."
links.text: "I can't believe this turned into another Mike thing... Fine, okay, I'll stick to it." She takes the device from you and places it in her lap. "I'll knock it out in three rounds."

links.title: You: "Put the tape recorder down."
links.text: Put the tape recorder down.

links.title: Empathy: "Nothing to emote over. You put the..."
links.text: Nothing to emote over. You put the device back on the ice.

links.title: You: ""Tell me more about this *music pla..."
links.text: "Tell me more about this *music place* you've been planning in the church."

links.title: Acele: ""What's... 'the D'?""
links.text: "What's... 'the D'?"

links.title: You: ""Kim, she seems legitimately confus..."
links.text: "Kim, she seems legitimately confused. Tell her what this *D* is."

links.title: You: ""What is going on?""
links.text: "What is going on?"

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: You: ""You seem surprisingly comfortable..."
links.text: "You seem surprisingly comfortable with being questioned. Why's that?"

links.title: You: ""Everyone's just mooching off the e..."
links.text: "Everyone's just mooching off the entrepreneurial class. Shackling the *doers*."

links.title: Acele: ""Oh, really?""
links.text: "Oh, really?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, people just can't get off th..."
links.text: "Yeah, people just can't get off their asses -- zero hireable talent in this city. Zero. No wonder everyone's poor as potatoes."

links.title: Acele: ""So, the thing that's been eating y..."
links.text: "So, the thing that's been eating you... is rich people not having enough money?"

links.title: You: ""You can roll your eyes all you wan..."
links.text: "You can roll your eyes all you want, but will it bring us any closer to a knowledge-based economy? I haven't seen much of this strange world, but: Not with these taxes it won't!"

links.title: Acele: ""Then you really haven't seen much..."
links.text: "Then you really haven't seen much of this *strange world*, because we literally haven't got any income taxes. Just a 20% value-added tax and that's, like... *it*."

links.title: You: ""No way! You have no idea how many..."
links.text: "No way! You have no idea how many taxes there *really* are -- you've never paid any! There are all these disguised, invisible taxes. Look, there's one right now!" (Point at the sea.)

links.title: Acele: "Startled, she turns her head and lo..."
links.text: Startled, she turns her head and looks at the sea. No modes of indirect taxation catch her eye. She looks back at you.

links.title: Acele: ""You have an issue with... the sea..."
links.text: "You have an issue with... the sea monster tax?"

links.title: You: ""No. Not *just* the sea monster tax..."
links.text: "No. Not *just* the sea monster tax. It's all of it taken together that's strangling economic growth."

links.title: Acele: ""Uh huh." She collects herself. "An..."
links.text: "Uh huh." She collects herself. "And none of this has anything to do with -- oh I don't know -- some chick?"

links.title: You: ""No, that's probably not it, is it?""
links.text: "No, that's probably not it, is it?"

links.title: Acele: ""No, it sounds like you've just got..."
links.text: "No, it sounds like you've just got chick issues."

links.title: You: ""Now that you mention it, I found t..."
links.text: "Now that you mention it, I found these letters I'd thrown in the trash. They *might* have something to do with it."

links.title: Acele: ""Okay, why do you think that?""
links.text: "Okay, why do you think that?"

links.title: You: ""First, they had just the faintest..."
links.text: "First, they had just the faintest scent of chewing gum on them. I could still smell it under the... shit."

links.title: Acele: ""Wow, man." She raises her eyebrow...."
links.text: "Wow, man." She raises her eyebrow. "That's pretty symbolic, don't you think?"

links.title: You: ""Yes, I found that to be very symbo..."
links.text: "Yes, I found that to be very symbolic too."

links.title: Acele: ""Okay, what else?""
links.text: "Okay, what else?"

links.title: You: ""No. Why?""
links.text: "No. Why?"

links.title: Acele: ""Used to be sweet, now it's shit --..."
links.text: "Used to be sweet, now it's shit -- seems pretty symbolic to me. Anyway, what else?

links.title: You: ""They were written in a woman's han..."
links.text: "They were written in a woman's hand. And oh boy did reading them make me not feel good."

links.title: Acele: ""There you have it then. Chick trou..."
links.text: "There you have it then. Chick trouble. Who is she?"

links.title: You: ""I don't remember.""
links.text: "I don't remember."

links.title: Acele: ""Really?" She appears to believe yo..."
links.text: "Really?" She appears to believe you. "You seem pretty upset about this *chica*... are you sure you don't remember anything about her?"

links.title: You: ""I remember her scent and that's al..."
links.text: "I remember her scent and that's all."

links.title: Acele: ""Wow, man. That's some pretty stran..."
links.text: "Wow, man. That's some pretty strange shit..." She rubs her sides for warmth. "Are you sure the letters were for you?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I'm sure. Why would I have r..."
links.text: "Yeah, I'm sure. Why would I have reacted so strongly otherwise?"

links.title: Acele: ""How come you don't remember though..."
links.text: "How come you don't remember though? Is it, like, some selective memory thing?"

links.title: You: ""Wait, what do you mean by *selecti..."
links.text: "Wait, what do you mean by *selective memory*?"

links.title: Acele: ""Man, when I get hurt I just wanna..."
links.text: "Man, when I get hurt I just wanna forget that shit, you know? That kind of selective memory."

links.title: You: ""I think it's more about me getting..."
links.text: "I think it's more about me getting so unbelievably drunk I completely erased all memory of this world."

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah. Or it might be that. This on..."
links.text: "Yeah. Or it might be that. This one time I did so much... booze that I forgot, too..."

links.title: Logic: "It's obvious she's "done" more than..."
links.text: It's obvious she's "done" more than "booze."

links.title: Acele: ""Or it might just be psych bullshit..."
links.text: "Or it might just be psych bullshit, you know? Königstein wank."

links.title: You: ""You might have a point there. Sele..."
links.text: "You might have a point there. Selective memory."

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah, or it might just be psych bu..."
links.text: "Yeah, or it might just be psych bullshit, you know? Königstein wank."

links.title: You: ""What is this *Königstein wank*?""
links.text: "What is this *Königstein wank*?"

links.title: Acele: ""You know: the psych thing they've..."
links.text: "You know: the psych thing they've got going on there. Rich people like it. People in Königstein are mostly rich."

links.title: You: ""Thanks for the bullshit psych thin..."
links.text: "Thanks for the bullshit psych thing then."

links.title: Acele: ""You're welcome." She thinks for a..."
links.text: "You're welcome." She thinks for a second, stretching her jaw. "Might be for the best to keep that shit forgotten though. Just my opinion. If it itches, don't scratch."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Yes, but it itches really, really b..."
links.text: Yes, but it itches really, really bad...

links.title: You: ""You know, I'm not sure this made t..."
links.text: "You know, I'm not sure this made things any better."

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah, I'm sorry." She nods. "Might..."
links.text: "Yeah, I'm sorry." She nods. "Might be for the best to keep that shit forgotten, actually. Just my opinion. If it itches, don't scratch."

links.title: You: ""Alright, I had some questions for..."
links.text: "Alright, I had some questions for you."

links.title: You: ""Come to think of it -- the *whore*..."
links.text: "Come to think of it -- the *whore* could have written them to her *lover*!"

links.title: Acele: ""C'mon, man. Don't be like that. I..."
links.text: "C'mon, man. Don't be like that. I mean, maybe she did, but you don't know that."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Feels *good* though, doesn't it? Th..."
links.text: Feels *good* though, doesn't it? The sting.

links.title: You: ""You're right. It doesn't help.""
links.text: "You're right. It doesn't help."

links.title: Acele: ""How come you don't remember though..."
links.text: "How come you don't remember though? Is it, like, some *selective memory* thing?"

links.title: You: ""What's there to know in this shit..."
links.text: "What's there to know in this shit hole, anyway?"

links.title: Acele: ""Beats me." She exhales a puff of s..."
links.text: "Beats me." She exhales a puff of shimmering cold air. A moment passes.

links.title: You: ""Yup. Next to nothing.""
links.text: "Yup. Next to nothing."

links.title: You: ""No idea. Haven't seen her, definit..."
links.text: "No idea. Haven't seen her, definitely haven't *called* her. I don't remember a single thing about her."

links.title: Acele: ""Really?" She appears to believe yo..."
links.text: "Really?" She appears to believe you. "You seem pretty upset about this *chica*... are you sure you don't remember anything about her? Eyes? Hair colour?"

links.title: You: ""To hell with this. Questions -- I..."
links.text: "To hell with this. Questions -- I had them. And you have answers."

links.title: Acele: ""Okay, of course... What did you wa..."
links.text: "Okay, of course... What did you want to know?"

links.title: You: ""You could be right, but I don't kn..."
links.text: "You could be right, but I don't know for certain."

links.title: Acele: ""Well... think about, anyway. Was t..."
links.text: "Well... think about, anyway. Was there something else?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, pretty sure. Now, I had some..."
links.text: "Yeah, pretty sure. Now, I had some questions about something else entirely."

links.title: You: "The tape recorder lies on the woode..."
links.text: The tape recorder lies on the wooden floorboards like a discarded toy. Pick it up.

links.title: Empathy: "The device is still warm from her t..."
links.text: The device is still warm from her touch -- and heavy as a brick, from the batteries inside. The company logo "Omicron" adorns its yellow plastic cover. Inside, the tape is rolling -- the girl looks at the device in your hands.

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry you have to sit here on..."
links.text: "I'm sorry you have to sit here on the ice, feeling miserable. At your age -- or at any age -- in this weather... waiting for it to get dark."

links.title: Empathy: "The device is cold to the touch. An..."
links.text: The device is cold to the touch. An angular "Omicron" logo adorns the yellow plastic cover. Underneath you see a reel of tape rolling. You put the device back on the ice.

links.title: You: "The tape recorder lies on the ice l..."
links.text: The tape recorder lies on the ice like a discarded toy. Pick it up.

links.title: You: "Catch the silver bird."
links.text: Catch the silver bird.

links.title: You: ""Actually, that's it for now." [Lea..."
links.text: "Actually, that's it for now." [Leave.]

links.title: Acele: ""Okay, bye." She turns her attentio..."
links.text: "Okay, bye." She turns her attention back to the recording device.

dialogueTree.title: Acele: ""Welcome back." She nods to you in..."
dialogueTree.text: "Welcome back." She nods to you in greeting.

dialogueTree.title: Acele: "The girl stands behind the row of p..."
dialogueTree.text: The girl stands behind the row of pulpits, whistling a melody with the electronic device pressed against the wood. At the sound of your footsteps, she stops what she was doing.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "That melody is oddly familiar... Wh..."
links.text: That melody is oddly familiar... Why does it feel like some gang-related thing?

links.title: Acele: ""Hey, there." She gives you a shy s..."
links.text: "Hey, there." She gives you a shy smile. "I've been recording some new audio from all these beams and rafters. The sounds travelling through the wood are pretty cool -- creaks and stuff. Like you're underwater, you know... But, like, underwater inside a tree."

links.title: Acele: ""And yes, I'm being more like Conta..."
links.text: "And yes, I'm being more like Contact Mike, alright. Don't even bring it up."

links.title: You: ""I wasn't going to --""
links.text: "I wasn't going to --"

links.title: Acele: ""No-no." She cuts you off before yo..."
links.text: "No-no." She cuts you off before you can finish the sentence. "I actually wanted to thank you. For getting me and my friends in here. And we even found some new... associates, such as they are."

links.title: You: ""But Contact Mike is --""
links.text: "But Contact Mike is --"

links.title: You: ""Okay, fine.""
links.text: "Okay, fine."

links.title: Acele: ""And no, it's got nothing to do wit..."
links.text: "And no, it's got nothing to do with Contact Mike."

links.title: Acele: ""But that's not really what I wante..."
links.text: "But that's not really what I wanted to talk about. I wanted to thank you instead."

links.title: You: ""What for?""
links.text: "What for?"

links.title: Acele: ""For getting me and my friends in h..."
links.text: "For getting me and my friends in here. And we even found some new... associates, such as they are."

links.title: You: ""Makes sense. I've likely deserved..."
links.text: "Makes sense. I've likely deserved some praise and adoration."

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah, so thanks for getting me and..."
links.text: "Yeah, so thanks for getting me and my friends in here." She ignores your vapid egocentrism. "And we even found some new associates, such as they are."

links.title: You: ""Oh, is that what the device is for?""
links.text: "Oh, is that what the device is for?"

links.title: Acele: ""This?" She taps on the electronic..."
links.text: "This?" She taps on the electronic device. "Yeah, it's a portable recording device. For field recording. Low quality, but still."

links.title: You: ""And the wires?""
links.text: "And the wires?"

links.title: Acele: ""Actually just one wire, I picked o..."
links.text: "Actually just one wire, I picked on it 'til the braiding came loose. The wire leads to a contact microphone."

links.title: You: ""What is a *contact microphone*?""
links.text: "What is a *contact microphone*?"

links.title: Acele: ""A contact mic is a microphone that..."
links.text: "A contact mic is a microphone that records sounds from inside things. Like all this wood."

links.title: You: ""Why would anyone do that?""
links.text: "Why would anyone do that?"

links.title: Acele: ""It's... it's not important, actual..."
links.text: "It's... it's not important, actually. Never mind, I actually wanted to thank you."

links.title: You: ""Okay, it's an odd hobby, but who a..."
links.text: "Okay, it's an odd hobby, but who am I to judge."

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah, well... actually, it's not i..."
links.text: "Yeah, well... actually, it's not important. I actually wanted to thank you."

links.title: You: ""Gotcha.""
links.text: "Gotcha."

links.title: Acele: ""I really wanted to say: thanks for..."
links.text: "I really wanted to say: thanks for getting me and my friends in here. And we even found some new... associates, such as they are."

links.title: You: ""How's everyone doing?""
links.text: "How's everyone doing?"

links.title: Acele: ""Good, I think. Noid is getting a r..."
links.text: "Good, I think. Noid is getting a read on the place, I think he finds the carpentry very impressive. Andre's been setting up the compressor and... dancing. Egg Head's keeping the party up, he's got the stage under control."

links.title: Acele: ""And the crab-man hasn't shown hims..."
links.text: "And the crab-man hasn't shown himself much, thank god."

links.title: Acele: ""Soona, the programmer, she's doing..."
links.text: "Soona, the programmer, she's doing... whatever she does, behind that radiocomputer of hers. She doesn't talk to us much. And the crab-man hasn't shown himself, thank god."

links.title: You: ""Alright, I got some questions for..."
links.text: "Alright, I got some questions for you."

links.title: Acele: ""Sure.""
links.text: "Sure."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Why does that trill sound familiar?"
links.text: Why does that trill sound familiar?

dialogueTree.title: Acele: ""Hey there." The girl with an elect..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hey there." The girl with an electronic recording apparatus turns to you as you approach.

links.title: Acele: ""Thanks for helping us out. My asso..."
links.text: "Thanks for helping us out. My associates and I are settling in here nicely. Even found some new associates." She turns back to her work, whistling softly...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Why does that melody sound so famil..."
links.text: Why does that melody sound so familiar?

links.title: You: ""You're Acele.""
links.text: "You're Acele."

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah," she responds, turning back..."
links.text: "Yeah," she responds, turning back to her device.

links.title: You: ""What are you doing?""
links.text: "What are you doing?"

links.title: Acele: ""Recording the audio coming through..."
links.text: "Recording the audio coming through the wooden framework. I bet it's pretty cool. Creaks and stuff. Sounds like when you're underwater, you know?"

links.title: You: ""Oh, is that what the device is for..."
links.text: "Oh, is that what the device is for?" (Point to it.)

links.title: Acele: ""This?" She taps on the electronic..."
links.text: "This?" She taps on the electronic device. "Yeah, it's a portable recording device. For field recording. Low quality, but still."

links.title: You: ""And the wires?""
links.text: "And the wires?"

links.title: Acele: ""Actually just one wire, I picked o..."
links.text: "Actually just one wire, I picked on it till the braiding came loose. The wire leads to a contact microphone."

links.title: You: ""What is a *contact microphone*?""
links.text: "What is a *contact microphone*?"

links.title: Acele: ""A contact mic is a microphone that..."
links.text: "A contact mic is a microphone that records sounds from inside things. Like all this wood."

links.title: You: ""Why would anyone do that?""
links.text: "Why would anyone do that?"

links.title: Acele: ""Because... Listen, man, why does a..."
links.text: "Because... Listen, man, why does anyone do anything?"

links.title: You: ""I just need a few minutes of your..."
links.text: "I just need a few minutes of your time. Police business."

links.title: Acele: ""I'm listening." She puts the conta..."
links.text: "I'm listening." She puts the contact mic down and props herself up a bit, waiting for you to speak.

links.title: You: ""Well, if it's not that important,..."
links.text: "Well, if it's not that important, you won't mind if I ask you a few questions."

links.title: Acele: ""I'm listening." She puts the conta..."
links.text: "I'm listening." She puts the contact mic down and props herself up a bit, waiting for you to speak.

links.title: You: ""I'll leave you to it, then." [Leav..."
links.text: "I'll leave you to it, then." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""Okay, it's an odd hobby, but who a..."
links.text: "Okay, it's an odd hobby, but who am I to judge."

links.title: Acele: "She shrugs, obviously eager to go b..."
links.text: She shrugs, obviously eager to go back to whatever she's doing.

links.title: You: ""Gotcha. I have some questions for..."
links.text: "Gotcha. I have some questions for you."

links.title: Acele: ""I'm listening." She puts the devic..."
links.text: "I'm listening." She puts the device down and props herself up a bit, waiting for you to speak.

dialogueTree.title: Acele: ""Is this about the hat again?" She..."
dialogueTree.text: "Is this about the hat again?" She looks up at you, distracted. "I don't see you wearing a hat..."

links.title: You: ""Come to think of it -- I *should*...."
links.text: "Come to think of it -- I *should*. Where would I get one around here?"

links.title: Acele: ""I don't know, some kind of a... st..."
links.text: "I don't know, some kind of a... store?" She pauses to think. "Maybe a general store... Look man, fuck the hat."

links.title: Half Light: "Your pulse rises."
links.text: Your pulse rises.

links.title: Authority: "What did she just say? That's not h..."
links.text: What did she just say? That's not how a civilian is supposed to address an officer of the law.

links.title: You: "Regain authority in her eyes."
links.text: Regain authority in her eyes.

links.title: Authority: "Your eyes are fixed on her as every..."
links.text: Your eyes are fixed on her as everything gets very still -- dangerously so...

links.title: You: ""Excuse me, what did you just say?""
links.text: "Excuse me, what did you just say?"

links.title: Acele: "She looks down, pretending to be bu..."
links.text: She looks down, pretending to be busy with the device.

links.title: Authority: "Make her meet your eyes."
links.text: Make her meet your eyes.

links.title: Empathy: "The kid isn't arrogant, she's just..."
links.text: The kid isn't arrogant, she's just afraid to look you in the eye. You already put her in her place.

links.title: You: ""I am the police. You would do well..."
links.text: "I am the police. You would do well to avoid this kind of language with me."

links.title: Acele: ""You're right, I shouldn't have swo..."
links.text: "You're right, I shouldn't have sworn. I'm sorry." She looks up like a scolded school girl, her years concealed beneath thick make up.

links.title: Perception: "Her hair is dyed blonde, with dark..."
links.text: Her hair is dyed blonde, with dark roots showing. Most men wouldn't exactly call her pretty -- there is a manliness to her. A coarseness.

links.title: You: ""Now. I have some questions for you.""
links.text: "Now. I have some questions for you."

links.title: Acele: "She gathers herself for a moment, t..."
links.text: She gathers herself for a moment, then says, "Okay."

links.title: You: ""Good, then my work here is done."..."
links.text: "Good, then my work here is done." [Leave.]

links.title: You: "(Kick some snow into her face with..."
links.text: (Kick some snow into her face with your boot.) "You did NOT just speak like that to the police."

links.title: Acele: ""I'm sorry, sir. I'm sorry. I was t..."
links.text: "I'm sorry, sir. I'm sorry. I was trying to concentrate on this thing here and I'm sorry I said that. My dad swears, my boyfriend swears... my whole family does. I've caught the habit. I didn't mean to... and I'm sorry."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Pain radiates through your leg. It..."
links.text: Pain radiates through your leg. It still hurts to use it -- even for kicking snow into someone's face.

links.title: Acele: "She looks up with a pained expressi..."
links.text: She looks up with a pained expression, her face caked with a thick layer of make up. With her left hand she's wiping some of it off to get the snow out of her face.

links.title: Authority: "Lots of feeling. Feel it up, *way*..."
links.text: Lots of feeling. Feel it up, *way* up.

links.title: You: ""Oh my god! FUCK THE HAT?! Is that..."
links.text: "Oh my god! FUCK THE HAT?! Is that what you just said to me? I can't *BELIEVE* you told me to fuck the hat!"

links.title: Authority: "You're saying it really loud, but i..."
links.text: You're saying it really loud, but it's not coming out right. Maybe add more indignation?

links.title: You: ""So I should just... just... take t..."
links.text: "So I should just... just... take this hat I'm wearing and FUCK it, right?!" (Point at your head, where the hat is located.) "Engage in sexual intercourse with a hat right here in front of you, because you told me so? On the SEA ICE?!"

links.title: Authority: "More."
links.text: More.

links.title: You: ""RIGHT HERE ON THE SEA ICE?!""
links.text: "RIGHT HERE ON THE SEA ICE?!"

links.title: Authority: "MORE."
links.text: MORE.

links.title: You: ""GIVE YOU A LITTLE... ICE-COP-HAT-F..."
links.text: "GIVE YOU A LITTLE... ICE-COP-HAT-FUCK-SHOW?!"

links.title: Acele: ""I didn't mean to, I'm sorry..." Th..."
links.text: "I didn't mean to, I'm sorry..." The girl is visibly shaken.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant is watching the scen..."
links.text: The lieutenant is watching the scene unfold before his eyes, unsure how to react.

links.title: You: ""IS THAT HOW YOU SEE ME?""
links.text: "IS THAT HOW YOU SEE ME?"

links.title: Acele: "The girl looks down, slowly curling..."
links.text: The girl looks down, slowly curling into a ball.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Three figures on the spring ice. On..."
links.text: Three figures on the spring ice. One, a shortish man, is standing with his shoulders slightly hunched. Another, a young woman, tries her best to ignore the third, a middle-aged man with bloated cheeks, who's screaming at her with all his might...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Across the bay, two figures watch t..."
links.text: Across the bay, two figures watch the scene unfold through coin-operated binoculars. "My god," one says in a concerned voice. "Let me see," says the other.

links.title: Empathy: "That's it, you've earned it -- star..."
links.text: That's it, you've earned it -- start crying, life's hard.

links.title: Composure: "Your shoulders have already tensed..."
links.text: Your shoulders have already tensed up with emotion. Let it all out.

links.title: You: "Start crying."
links.text: Start crying.

links.title: Acele: "The young woman has kept her eyes t..."
links.text: The young woman has kept her eyes trained on her wires, waiting for the sorry spectacle to end, but it's gone awful quiet up there. Then, the sound of sobbing...

links.title: Acele: "Looking up she sees a grown man --..."
links.text: Looking up she sees a grown man -- on the wrong side of forty, his face bloated from alcohol and god knows what else -- not so quietly crying.

links.title: Acele: ""This... isn't really about the hat..."
links.text: "This... isn't really about the hat, is it?"

links.title: Acele: ""You know, you're not the only one..."
links.text: "You know, you're not the only one with issues." There's a motherly hint to her voice. "I self-medicate, shit... life's a horror, you know."

links.title: Acele: ""Crying helps, though. Get it out o..."
links.text: "Crying helps, though. Get it out of your system and then maybe we can talk, okay? I'll be here."

links.title: You: ""It is! It *so* is!""
links.text: "It is! It *so* is!"

links.title: You: "(Wipe away the tears.) "Anyway... I..."
links.text: (Wipe away the tears.) "Anyway... I can't believe you would use obscenities like that in front of a... a police officer. And you should wear a hat, too."

links.title: Acele: ""I swear to god, I will always wear..."
links.text: "I swear to god, I will always wear a hat from now on."

links.title: You: ""Would it be alright... if I asked..."
links.text: "Would it be alright... if I asked you some questions now?"

links.title: You: ""Good, then my work here is done."..."
links.text: "Good, then my work here is done." [Leave.]

links.title: Acele: ""Wait...""
links.text: "Wait..."

links.title: You: ""Anyway... I can't believe you used..."
links.text: "Anyway... I can't believe you used obscenities like that in front of a police officer. And you should... you should..."

links.title: Acele: "The words are stuck in your throat...."
links.text: The words are stuck in your throat. All that comes out is tears, pouring down your face. The young woman has kept her eyes trained on her wires, waiting for the lecture to end, but now she hears sobbing...

links.title: Acele: "Looking up she sees a grown man --..."
links.text: Looking up she sees a grown man -- on the wrong side of forty, his face bloated from alcohol and god knows what else -- not so quietly crying.

links.title: Acele: ""This... isn't really about the hat..."
links.text: "This... isn't really about the hat, is it?"

links.title: You: "(Wipe away the tears.) "And you sho..."
links.text: (Wipe away the tears.) "And you should wear a hat, that's it, that's what I wanted to say."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Three figures on the spring ice. On..."
links.text: Three figures on the spring ice. One, a shortish man, is standing with his shoulders slightly hunched. Another, a young woman, tries her best to ignore the third, a middle-aged man with spectacular sideburns, who's screaming at her with all his might...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Two figures on the spring ice. One,..."
links.text: Two figures on the spring ice. One, a young woman, tries her best to ignore the other, a middle-aged man with bloated cheeks, who's screaming at her with all his might...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Two figures on the spring ice. One,..."
links.text: Two figures on the spring ice. One, a young woman, tries her best to ignore the other, a middle-aged man with spectacular sideburns, who's screaming at her with all his might...

links.title: You: "(Puff your cheeks as if you can't e..."
links.text: (Puff your cheeks as if you can't even *breathe* from the sheer indignity of the affront!)

links.title: Acele: ""I didn't mean to, I'm sorry..." Th..."
links.text: "I didn't mean to, I'm sorry..." The girl is visibly shaken.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant is watching the scen..."
links.text: The lieutenant is watching the scene unfold before his eyes, unsure how to react.

links.title: You: "(Start jumping up and down on the s..."
links.text: (Start jumping up and down on the sea ice, gesturing toward it with both hands, as if to say, *this* is where it was supposed to take place!)

links.title: Acele: "The girl looks down, slowly curling..."
links.text: The girl looks down, slowly curling into a ball.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Three figures on the spring ice. On..."
links.text: Three figures on the spring ice. One, a shortish man, is standing with his shoulders slightly hunched. Another, a young woman, tries her best to ignore the third, a middle-aged man with bloated cheeks, jumping up and down on the sea ice...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Three figures on the spring ice. On..."
links.text: Three figures on the spring ice. One, a shortish man, is standing with his shoulders slightly hunched. Another, a young woman, tries her best to ignore the third, a middle-aged man with spectacular sideburns, jumping up and down on the sea ice...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Two figures on the spring ice. One,..."
links.text: Two figures on the spring ice. One, a young woman, tries her best to ignore the other, a middle-aged man with bloated cheeks, jumping up and down on the sea ice...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Two figures on the spring ice. One,..."
links.text: Two figures on the spring ice. One, a young woman, tries her best to ignore the other, a middle-aged man with spectacular sideburns, jumping up and down on the sea ice...

links.title: You: ""So I should just... just... get a..."
links.text: "So I should just... just... get a hat and FUCK it, right?!" (Point at your head, where the hat should be.) "Engage in sexual intercourse with a hat right here in front of you, because you told me so? On the SEA ICE?!"

links.title: You: ""Is that kind of language really ne..."
links.text: "Is that kind of language really necessary?"

links.title: Acele: ""I'm sorry I said 'fuck the hat.' I..."
links.text: "I'm sorry I said 'fuck the hat.' I was concentrating on something else..."

links.title: Acele: ""My whole family swears and it rubb..."
links.text: "My whole family swears and it rubbed off on me..." There's a pained expression on her face. She'll answer your questions now.

links.title: You: ""*I* don't have to do anything, I'm..."
links.text: "*I* don't have to do anything, I'm a police officer. *You*, however, have to do what I say."

links.title: Acele: ""Real cool..." She looks down at th..."
links.text: "Real cool..." She looks down at the device, mumbling under her breath.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): ""Way to abuse that power, man..." s..."
links.text: "Way to abuse that power, man..." she says, thinking you can't hear her.

links.title: Composure: "She bats away your questions like f..."
links.text: She bats away your questions like flies. She's not intimidated by mere police officers.

links.title: You: ""And the law says you have to wear..."
links.text: "And the law says you have to wear a hat in this weather."

links.title: Acele: ""Tsk..." She lets a quiet *tsk* rol..."
links.text: "Tsk..." She lets a quiet *tsk* roll off her tongue. "What kind of law says that?"

links.title: You: ""The Hat Law.""
links.text: "The Hat Law."

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah, well..." She tries to think..."
links.text: "Yeah, well..." She tries to think of something to say, but can't. "Look man, fuck the hat."

links.title: You: ""The Law of Seasons. You'll get sic..."
links.text: "The Law of Seasons. You'll get sick if you don't."

links.title: You: ""What are we even talking about?""
links.text: "What are we even talking about?"

links.title: Acele: ""Man, I have no clue, either.""
links.text: "Man, I have no clue, either."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is not a good questioning tec..."
links.text: "This is not a good questioning technique."

links.title: You: ""Questions, right! I had some for y..."
links.text: "Questions, right! I had some for you."

links.title: Acele: ""Like what?" She straightens out sl..."
links.text: "Like what?" She straightens out slightly, propping herself up with her hands.

links.title: You: ""That's it, I'm going. Wear a hat o..."
links.text: "That's it, I'm going. Wear a hat or catch a cold, I don't care." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""So keep that in mind while I ask s..."
links.text: "So keep that in mind while I ask some questions."

links.title: Acele: ""Like what?" She straightens out sl..."
links.text: "Like what?" She straightens out slightly, propping herself up with her hands, waiting for you to speak.

links.title: You: ""I should -- and I do." (Point at y..."
links.text: "I should -- and I do." (Point at your hat.)

links.title: Acele: ""Oh, I didn't notice that.""
links.text: "Oh, I didn't notice that."

links.title: You: ""It's nice. You should wear one, to..."
links.text: "It's nice. You should wear one, too, if you plan on staying outside in this weather."

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah, well..." She tries to think..."
links.text: "Yeah, well..." She tries to think of something to say. "Look man, fuck the hat."

links.title: You: ""Now that that's all cleared up, I..."
links.text: "Now that that's all cleared up, I have some questions for you."

links.title: Acele: ""Sorry, man. My mind was elsewhere...."
links.text: "Sorry, man. My mind was elsewhere." She puts the device down. "Shoot."

links.title: You: ""I'm done here." [Leave.]"
links.text: "I'm done here." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Acele: ""Hello again." The girl looks up at..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hello again." The girl looks up at you for a moment before turning back to her work.

dialogueTree.title: Acele: "The shaggy-haired girl kneels on th..."
dialogueTree.text: The shaggy-haired girl kneels on the sea ice. She looks up as you approach.

links.title: Acele: ""So you talked to my associates, ri..."
links.text: "So you talked to my associates, right? Are you gonna help us? With the church, I mean."

links.title: You: ""I'll help you all right.""
links.text: "I'll help you all right."

links.title: Acele: ""Great!" She shivers. "Let us know..."
links.text: "Great!" She shivers. "Let us know if there's any progress, will you? We've been waiting for weeks here."

links.title: You: ""I didn't see a case in the church..."
links.text: "I didn't see a case in the church story."

links.title: Acele: ""Okay... but you'll still let us kn..."
links.text: "Okay... but you'll still let us know if you learn something about the church, right?" She rubs her sides. "We don't have anywhere else to go anyway."

links.title: You: ""I've yet to make up my mind.""
links.text: "I've yet to make up my mind."

links.title: Acele: ""Take your time, I guess. We don't..."
links.text: "Take your time, I guess. We don't have anywhere else to go anyway."

links.title: You: ""Can't say. Gotta ask questions fir..."
links.text: "Can't say. Gotta ask questions first."

links.title: Acele: ""Shoot." A cold wind blows. She bre..."
links.text: "Shoot." A cold wind blows. She breathes on her hands for warmth.

links.title: You: ""Never mind." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Never mind." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Acele: "A shaggy-looking girl in her late t..."
dialogueTree.text: A shaggy-looking girl in her late teens or early twenties kneels on the ice with an electronic contraption in her hand. Hearing you approach, she looks up.

links.title: Acele: ""Oh, hello there.""
links.text: "Oh, hello there."

links.title: Acele: "She must be Acele, the last of the..."
links.text: She must be Acele, the last of the speedfreaks' 'posse'.

links.title: Empathy: "It's cold out here, but she's not w..."
links.text: It's cold out here, but she's not wearing a hat! She must be freezing.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Everyone knows drugs make you invul..."
links.text: Everyone knows drugs make you invulnerable to cold. You bet this one likes to *party*.

links.title: You: ""You must be Acele.""
links.text: "You must be Acele."

links.title: Acele: ""That's my name. I take it you have..."
links.text: "That's my name. I take it you have met the others. Did they tell you about the church and the club... thing?"

links.title: You: ""They did.""
links.text: "They did."

links.title: Acele: ""Will you help us?""
links.text: "Will you help us?"

links.title: You: ""I'll help you all right.""
links.text: "I'll help you all right."

links.title: You: ""I didn't see a case in the church..."
links.text: "I didn't see a case in the church story."

links.title: You: ""I've yet to make up my mind.""
links.text: "I've yet to make up my mind."

links.title: You: ""How did you know I'd met them?""
links.text: "How did you know I'd met them?"

links.title: Acele: ""I, like, saw you go into the tent...."
links.text: "I, like, saw you go into the tent. It's right there."

links.title: You: ""What happens in the tent stays in..."
links.text: "What happens in the tent stays in the tent."

links.title: Acele: ""That's cool by me." She nods knowi..."
links.text: "That's cool by me." She nods knowingly.

links.title: Composure: "She looks prettier all of a sudden...."
links.text: She looks prettier all of a sudden. The muscles of her face have relaxed. She must be quite pleased.

links.title: You: ""Church, what church?" (Act confuse..."
links.text: "Church, what church?" (Act confused.)

links.title: Acele: ""C'mon, quit playin'. Will you help..."
links.text: "C'mon, quit playin'. Will you help us with the church?"

links.title: You: ""Dear child, it's freezing. Where's..."
links.text: "Dear child, it's freezing. Where's your hat?"

links.title: Acele: ""Huh?" She looks up at you, distrac..."
links.text: "Huh?" She looks up at you, distracted.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Maybe she didn't hear you. A little..."
links.text: Maybe she didn't hear you. A little louder.

links.title: You: ""I said, you should have a hat on.""
links.text: "I said, you should have a hat on."

links.title: You: ""So, you wanna *party*?""
links.text: "So, you wanna *party*?"

links.title: Acele: ""What?" She looks up at you, confus..."
links.text: "What?" She looks up at you, confused.

links.title: You: "(Say it again louder, she might not..."
links.text: (Say it again louder, she might not have heard you over the wind.) "DO YOU WANT TO PARTY?!"

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah, I heard you, but what do you..."
links.text: "Yeah, I heard you, but what do you *mean* by 'party'?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, what *do* you mean?" The lieu..."
links.text: "Yes, what *do* you mean?" The lieutenant sounds serious.

links.title: You: ""I mean: we get drinks, come back h..."
links.text: "I mean: we get drinks, come back here, sit on the frozen sea ice and drink until we start talking about fucked-up emotional stuff. The *worst*."

links.title: Acele: ""You know, that sounds kinda nice...""
links.text: "You know, that sounds kinda nice..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, it doesn't.""
links.text: "No, it doesn't."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You." The lieutenant turns to you...."
links.text: "You." The lieutenant turns to you. "If you were intending to use an unorthodox questioning technique for this branch of the investigation -- which, by the way, is tangential at best -- you should have let me in on it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As it stands, I'm going to have to..."
links.text: "As it stands, I'm going to have to thwart your plan by explaining to the woman that we are police officers."

links.title: Acele: ""Oh, of course." She doesn't sound..."
links.text: "Oh, of course." She doesn't sound surprised.

links.title: You: ""We have some questions for you.""
links.text: "We have some questions for you."

links.title: Acele: "She's waiting."
links.text: She's waiting.

links.title: You: ""Uh... we'll be back later." [Leave..."
links.text: "Uh... we'll be back later." [Leave.]

links.title: Authority: "Odd. Something about the way she sa..."
links.text: Odd. Something about the way she says it makes you think she's not bothered by any of the cop-show questioning.

links.title: Acele: ""... but I shouldn't, really. I hav..."
links.text: "... but I shouldn't, really. I have stuff planned for tomorrow. Gotta run around, try to make some money."

links.title: Empathy: "It's not that she has to run around..."
links.text: It's not that she has to run around and make money, it's more like she's concerned about her well-being. It is also not entirely because she's afraid of you. You can't really put your finger on it.

links.title: You: ""Goddamnit, why's there no one to d..."
links.text: "Goddamnit, why's there no one to drink with by the seaside!" (Raise your hands in lamentation.)

links.title: Acele: ""Sorry.""
links.text: "Sorry."

links.title: You: ""There's some stuff I want to ask a..."
links.text: "There's some stuff I want to ask about."

links.title: You: ""Okay, I guess I'll fuck off then."..."
links.text: "Okay, I guess I'll fuck off then." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""Money -- just gotta keep making it..."
links.text: "Money -- just gotta keep making it, huh? But, in the meantime -- care to tell me something of interest?"

links.title: Acele: ""Like what?"
links.text: "Like what?

links.title: You: ""Oh well. You up for a conversation..."
links.text: "Oh well. You up for a conversation, at least?"

links.title: Acele: ""We can do that.""
links.text: "We can do that."

links.title: You: ""I'd better be going." [Leave.]"
links.text: "I'd better be going." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""I mean: we buy drinks, and, right..."
links.text: "I mean: we buy drinks, and, right there in the liquor store, we get those bad boys in us, and then *you* tell *me* what you mean when *you* say *party*!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thing is, I haven't said *party*...""
links.text: "Thing is, I haven't said *party*..."

links.title: You: ""You will once you get those bad bo..."
links.text: "You will once you get those bad boys in you."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... and neither have you. Had you..."
links.text: "... and neither have you. Had you let me in on the script of this play before you performed it, I could have gone along. As it stands, the entire line of questioning has been compromised."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We have nothing left to do but hop..."
links.text: "We have nothing left to do but hope this *was* a play on your part -- and to move on. Now." He turns to the young woman. "We have some questions for you."

links.title: Acele: ""Like what?""
links.text: "Like what?"

links.title: You: "(Whisper.) "Kim, stop it, you're sp..."
links.text: (Whisper.) "Kim, stop it, you're spoiling everything!"

links.title: You: ""Um, yeah, and I would like to ask..."
links.text: "Um, yeah, and I would like to ask some questions now. So, questions."

links.title: Acele: ""Uh huh...""
links.text: "Uh huh..."

links.title: Acele: ""Sorry, I have stuff planned for to..."
links.text: "Sorry, I have stuff planned for tomorrow. Gotta run around, try to make some money."

links.title: Empathy: "It's not that she has to run around..."
links.text: It's not that she has to run around and make money, it's more like she's concerned about her well-being. It is also not entirely because she's afraid of you. You can't really put your finger on it.

links.title: You: ""I mean: we get drinks -- and we al..."
links.text: "I mean: we get drinks -- and we also get drugs."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yeah, man..." The lieutenant sudde..."
links.text: "Yeah, man..." The lieutenant suddenly appears to your right with his collar popped *insanely* high.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Got any dope? We need some dope ba..."
links.text: "Got any dope? We need some dope bad." He scratches his nose, then his armpit through the jacket. "I got the *Boogie Street* shakes."

links.title: Drama: "He's really shaking and everything!"
links.text: He's really shaking and everything!

links.title: You: ""Wow!""
links.text: "Wow!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Tryin'a score some *dope*, man. Tr..."
links.text: "Tryin'a score some *dope*, man. Tryin'a score some smack -- you got any?" He hops from one foot to the other.

links.title: Acele: ""What's *smack*?""
links.text: "What's *smack*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The *D*, man, gotta hit that D!""
links.text: "The *D*, man, gotta hit that D!"

links.title: You: ""Um... Kim? What are you doing?""
links.text: "Um... Kim? What are you doing?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Tryin'a score some *dope*, man. Li..."
links.text: "Tryin'a score some *dope*, man. Like we planned. Tryin'a score some smack -- you got any?" He hops from one foot to the other in anticipation.

links.title: You: "Let the lieutenant do his thing."
links.text: Let the lieutenant do his thing.

links.title: Acele: ""Sorry, mister, I don't really do d..."
links.text: "Sorry, mister, I don't really do drugs. Especially with people I just met."

links.title: Logic: "Why would a categorical *no* need a..."
links.text: Why would a categorical *no* need a conditional *no* to support it?

links.title: You: ""Don't we have a bit of a logical i..."
links.text: "Don't we have a bit of a logical inconsistency here? A categorical *no"* and a conditional *no*? Poor logic is a good sign of *lies*."

links.title: Acele: ""It just means that even if I did d..."
links.text: "It just means that even if I did do drugs, I would not do them with a person I just met." She looks confused.

links.title: You: ""Maybe we should get acquainted, th..."
links.text: "Maybe we should get acquainted, then?"

links.title: Acele: "She looks up, not entirely sure wha..."
links.text: She looks up, not entirely sure what that means.

links.title: You: ""Oh, I see. I'm not good enough for..."
links.text: "Oh, I see. I'm not good enough for the lady. She's accustomed to more gentlemanly folk. Well, so be it." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""What's with the not doing drugs th..."
links.text: "What's with the not doing drugs thing? You done enough already? So many nice drugs left undone..."

links.title: Acele: ""Sorry?" She looks confused."
links.text: "Sorry?" She looks confused.

links.title: You: ""I'm going to have to accept your a..."
links.text: "I'm going to have to accept your apology, aren't I? What else is there to do? Now tell me about stuff, who you are, what you're doing here, things like that."

links.title: Acele: ""Where do I start?""
links.text: "Where do I start?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, yeah. Sorry I asked." [Leave..."
links.text: "Yeah, yeah. Sorry I asked." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""I said, 'You should have a hat on.'""
links.text: "I said, 'You should have a hat on.'"

links.title: Acele: ""So should you.""
links.text: "So should you."

links.title: Half Light: "You don't *have* to do anything."
links.text: You don't *have* to do anything.

links.title: You: ""Nothing. I have some questions for..."
links.text: "Nothing. I have some questions for you."

links.title: You: ""I have some questions for you.""
links.text: "I have some questions for you."

links.title: Inland Empire: "For some reason, the words don't co..."
links.text: For some reason, the words don't come out. Instead you instinctively touch your collar to check your necktie.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "It's crooked again, it always is. I..."
links.text: It's crooked again, it always is. It's a traffic accident and a noose. Also, you should ask if she wants to party. Or better yet, ask her about that hat! Lest the necktie think you're boring...

links.title: You: "(Bad necktie! Let go of the tie.) "..."
links.text: (Bad necktie! Let go of the tie.) "I wanted to ask you some questions."

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "I thought you were *cool*. What hap..."
links.text: I thought you were *cool*. What happened, man?

links.title: Acele: ""I'm listening." A cold wind blows..."
links.text: "I'm listening." A cold wind blows in from the sea. She breathes on her fingers for warmth, looking up at you.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Acele: ""So, like..." The girl on the ice l..."
dialogueTree.text: "So, like..." The girl on the ice looks up at you. "Seriously, what's eating you, man?"

links.title: Empathy: "There is a hint of pity in her eyes..."
links.text: There is a hint of pity in her eyes.

links.title: Perception: "Her hair is dyed blonde, with dark..."
links.text: Her hair is dyed blonde, with dark roots showing, and she wears thick black eye-liner. Most men wouldn't call her pretty -- there is a manliness to her. A coarseness.
